chapters.title: Chapter 14: What Wise Ones Know
chapters.info: Reene Harfor, p. 337 (402)—Elayne's chamber greeter and First Maid of the Royal Palace in Andor. She keeps her gray hair in a neat bun. She has a round face, and always carries an air of regal dignity. She has taken it upon herself to ferret out spies in the Palace, and has found several.
